column8: MALACCA: A female civil servant here has landed herself in hot water for allegedly posting an offensive comment about Prime Minister Datuk Seri Najib Tun Razak.Chief Minister Datuk Seri Idris Haron revealed that the state secretary was probing the comment made by the clerical worker of a state department.He said an internal inquiry would also be carried out by the department’s director.She had allegedly made the remark on Facebook in response to a post by another user on Feb 5.Read more at http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...2ix5FzlTxtJr.99
kesian, kalau tak sukak kerajaan jangan nak kerja di sektor kerajaan.
